participant_1.background:
After a long day of creating websites, I like to go for a run to clear my head.
I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I love spending time with my pets and they bring me so much joy.

participant_2.background:
My biggest fear is that something will happen to my kids.
My favorite music is the kind that gets my blood pumping and makes me want to dance.
i like to do all my shopping at walmart.
I'm glad that I have enough free time to read again now that my children are grown.
I am working on losing weight to improve my health.

content.text: I like to work out and run to clear my head.  What do you do to destress?
I love to listen to music that gets my blood pumping.  What are some of your favorite songs?
I love all kinds of music, but I've been listening to a lot of Rick and Morty lately.
I've never heard of that.  Can you tell me about it?
It's a cartoon about a scientist and his grandson who go on adventures in space and time.  It's really funny and clever.
That sounds like something I would like.  I'll have to check it out.
No problem!  What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom right now, but I'm going back to school to become a teacher.
That's great!  What kind of teacher do you want to be?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about elementary school.
That's a great choice!  I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
